Name: Mini Transport
About the game: Bored at home during the Spring Festival, I made a small game to entertain myself. This game is very simple to start, drag and drop lines between each node to establish a connection, in order to transport the product of one node to another node, produce a new product or sell it. In this process, pay attention to the use of limited human resources to increase the speed of certain pipelines in order to achieve load balancing throughout the industry chain. And be careful not to let yourself go bankrupt with rising maintenance fees.
Meta Title: Mini Transport: Feb 20, 2020, JinDing Chen and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Mini Transport? Check out the release date (Feb 20, 2020), developer insights from JinDing Chen, and a complete game summary.
